mapper.sql: id, cellphone, realname, create_time, update_time, login_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into t_admin_user (id, cellphone, realname, create_time, update_time, login_time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update t_admin_user set cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
